125608.「我が名は 光導使ナズナ……\n 我らが主 聖光教主と 交わせし誓いのもと\n:
My name is Light Guide Nazuna... and under the
oath exchanged with our Lord, the Light Lord,
I lead the fighter <pc>.

125609.「深遠なる意思に導かれ 紡がれし光芒。 \n 幾千もの光芒集いて 束になれば\n:
Guided by a profound will, a beam of light
spun. If thousands of beams of light become
one, they will turn into a holy light.

125610.「聖光よ その大いなる輝きをもって\n この混迷の世界に あまねく降り注ぐ\n:
O Holy Light, with your great radiance, be the
hope that pervades this chaotic world!

125611.「これで よし。\n それじゃ 慈愛の紋章を 高くかかげてね。:
There we go. Now, hold high the Kindness
Crest.

125613.「今 聖光を紡ぎし \n 闘戦士 <pc>の 慈愛のチカラを捧げ\n 次なる道を:
Now, we weave the holy light and devote the
power of the kindness of <pc> to open
the way to the next path!
